metadata.dc:author: Gassó Matoses, M
Calatrava Gadea, S
Díaz Calleja, E
Moreno Pérez, F
García Víctor, F
Ferrero Doria, R
Huertas Valero, E
metadata.dc:description: Case report of a retroperitoneal liposarcoma pleomorfico with calcification in diagnosed in our hospital. We comment on its clinical characteristics, diagnostic methods and treatment. We likewise comment the possible differential diagnoses.
metadata.dc:title: Liposarcoma retroperitoneal calcificado.
[Calcified retroperitoneal liposarcoma].
